00029 using std::string;
00030 using std::vector;
00031 using std::sort;
00032 using std::ostream;

00034 
00035 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 // Constructor: uvm_event
00037 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 uvm_event::uvm_event(const string& name) :
00039     uvm_callback_agent<puvm_event>(),
00040     sc_core::sc_event(),
00041     m_name(name),
00042     m_notified(false),
00043     m_time(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME),
00044     m_reset_event(),
00045     m_uvm_object(NULL)
00046 {
00047     //TODO - don't need to re-spawn - use SC_METHOD instead
00048     sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_event::wait_notification, this));
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 // Function : notify
00054 //  Trigger event with data
00055 //
00056 // Parameters:
00057 //   obj - object data for this event
00058 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 void uvm_event::notify (uvm_object* obj)
00060 {
00061     m_uvm_object = obj;
00062     ::sc_core::sc_event::notify();
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 void uvm_event::wait_on()
00067 {
00068     if (m_notified == false)
00069         wait();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void uvm_event::wait_off()
00073 {
00074     if (m_notified == true)
00075         ::sc_core::wait(m_reset_event);
00076 }
00077 
00078 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 // Function : get_trigger_time
00080 //  Return the trigger time.
00081 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 sc_core::sc_time uvm_event::get_trigger_time()
00083 {
00084     return m_time;
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool uvm_event::is_on()
00088 {
00089     return m_notified;
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool uvm_event::is_off()
00093 {
00094     return (!m_notified);
00095 }
00096 
00097 void uvm_event::reset()
00098 {
00099     m_notified = false;
00100     m_time     = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00101 }
00102 
00103 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 // Function : handle_callback
00105 //  Calls all callback registered to this event.
00106 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107     //uvm_event_mgr::Instance()->register_event(this);
00108 void uvm_event::handle_callback()
00109 {
00110     // TODO - is this the correct way to call the 'agent's notify?
00111     this->uvm_event_callback_agent::notify(this);
00112 }
00113 
00114 //TODO - remove spawning thread, convert this to an SC_METHOD fn
00115 //       that is sensititive to this event
00116 void uvm_event::wait_notification()
00117 {
00118     
00119     //sc_core::sc_event this_event = *this;
00120 
00121     ::sc_core::wait(*this);
00122     m_time = sc_core::sc_time_stamp();
00123     m_notified = true;
00124     handle_callback();
00125 
00126     //TODO - don't need to re-spawn - use SC_METHOD instead
00127     sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_event::wait_notification, this));
00128 }

00130 //---------------------------------------------------------------
00131 ostream & operator<< ( ostream & os , const uvm_event & a_disp_ev ) 
00132 {
00133     return os << " uvm_event : " << a_disp_ev.m_name ; 
00134 }
